meanings.sent1: The grumpiest cat in the neighborhood hissed at everyone.
meanings.sent2: She became the grumpiest when she didn't get her morning coffee.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpiest cloud couldn't stop the sun from shining.
meanings.sent4: His grumpiest expression could scare away even the bravest of souls.
meanings.sent5: The grumpiest old man on the block always yelled at kids to stay off his lawn.

meanings.definition: Showing a bad temper or irritability
meanings.sent1: The grumpiest customer complained about everything in the store.
meanings.sent2: The grumpiest child in the class refused to share his toys.
meanings.sent3: The grumpiest puppy chewed up all the shoes in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her grumpiest glare made everyone quiet down instantly.
meanings.sent5: The grumpiest boss always yelled at employees for small mistakes.
